44-5242.01.Health carrier or carrier, defined.

Health carrier or carrier shall mean any entity that provides health insurance in this state. Health carrier or carrier shall include an insurance company, a fraternal benefit society, a health maintenance organization, and any other entity providing a plan of health insurance or health benefits subject to state insurance regulation.

SourceLaws 1994, LB 1222, ยง 11;R.S.Supp.,1996, ยง 44-5233;Laws 1997, LB 862, ยง 37.
